item.title: Spread of COVID19
item.author: ben2koos@gmail.com (Ben Koos)
item.description: If you play around with the slider on the interactive chart below you can see how COVID-19 spread throughout the contiguous United States. #{r echo = F} #knitr::include_app("https://ben-koos.shinyapps.io/static-covid-map/", height = "600px") # When I made these charts, the first thing I noticed was how much faster the disease spread in coastal areas of the United States. Even in May, there are still numerous counties in the center of the country that havenâ€™t reported a single case of COVID-19.

item.title: About
item.author: ben2koos@gmail.com (Ben Koos)
item.description: About Hello! this is brand new personal website where I will log analysis I have done. Since this site is brand new, I am not entirely sure what I will post about the most, but in general I am interested in economics, machine learning, statistics and cool data visualization.
